openerSection: The IndusInd Bank has recently launched a premium co-branded credit card in partnership with Club Vistara: Club Vistara IndusInd Bank Explorer Credit Card. The card is currently being issued in association with Visa, but the bank plans to come up with the Mastercard variant as well once the RBI permits the issuance of new credit cards on Mastercard. It is issued at a joining fee of Rs. 40,000 and offers exciting welcome benefits like Club Vistara gold membership, a business class ticket voucher, and a gift voucher of your choice. The card rewards with Club Vistara Points and for every Rs. 200 spent with the card, cardholders can earn up to 8 CV Points.

Under its milestone program, you can earn up to 5 business class ticket vouchers every year. To make your travel experiences even luxurious, the card offers complimentary membership of Priority Pass and free domestic and international airport lounge visits. Other than that, you can enjoy 2 complimentary movie tickets per month via BookMyShow and a 20% discount on non-movie bookings. Keep reading to know more about the Club Vistara IndusInd Bank Explorer Credit Card.

welcomeGifts: Exciting gift vouchers worth Rs. 25,000 as a welcome benefit.

Welcome Benefits: Complimentary Club Vistara Gold Membership, complimentary business class ticket, and exclusive gift vouchers worth Rs 25,000.
Movie & Dining: Buy 1 Get 1 Free (BOGO) offer on movie tickets via BookMyShow & Rs. 3,000 off on dining twice a year.
Rewards Rate: On every spend of Rs. 200, you get 8 CV Points on the Club Vistara website, 6 CV Points on travel-related spends, 1 CV Point on utilities, insurance & fuel, and 2 CV Points elsewhere.
Reward Redemption: The CV Points earned are redeemable against travel-related bookings on Club Vistara website.
Travel: Complimentary domestic and international lounge visits.
International Lounge Access: 4 complimentary access to international lounges every quarter via Priority Pass.
Insurance Benefits: Air accident cover (worth Rs. 2.5 crores) and many other travel insurance covers.
Zero Liability Protection: Cardholders will not be held liable for any unauthorized transactions made on the card after reporting the loss to the bank.

Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge is waived off at all fuel stations.
